entry.title: WIND WARNING , Salluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:17 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

Observed at: Salluit Airport 10:00 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Blizzard developing near midnight. Blowing snow this evening. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 early this evening then to 80 gusting to 100 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Blizzard. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending near noon then snow and blowing snow. Wind south 70 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Local blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 36 in the evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
